price: 你应当把亲戚、贫民、旅客所应得的周济分给他们，你不要挥霍；
arabic: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waāti dhā al-qur'bā ḥaqqahu wal-mis'kīna wa-ib'na al-sabīli walā tubadhir tabdhīran
